entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @SaharaReporters We are just giving this people unmerritted publicity. These guys are toying with our destiny for their own greed. You will be shocked,everyone will test negative next week.They needed the hype to draw the attention of the world donor agencies funding fight against covid19 to Nig
